Package business

Class DeliveryService

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
business.DeliveryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeliveryServiceProcessing
public class DeliveryService extends Observable implements IDeliveryServiceProcessing
Author:
Alexandra Maria Sicobean This class is responsible for most of the operations that go behind the main two users: Admin and Client

  • Method Details

    • menuStillAvailable

      public boolean menuStillAvailable()
      This method is used for the invariant assertions. It checks the size of the menu as to never reach a negative state
      Returns:
      returns true if the number of items in the menu is greater than 0 and false otherwise

    • generateReports

      public void generateReports(int startHour, int endHour, int minNoOrderedProducts, int minNoOrdersFromAClient, int minPricePerOrder, int dayOfOrder)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      This method generates the reports for the admin based on the preiously placed orders
      Specified by:
      generateReports in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      startHour - the starting hour used to find the orders placed in a certain interval
      endHour - the ending hour used to find the orders placed in a certain interval
      minNoOrderedProducts - the minimum number of orders for a certain product
      minNoOrdersFromAClient - the minimum number of orders from a certain client
      minPricePerOrder - the minimum price for orders
      dayOfOrder - the day for which the reports will be computed
